section.p: Desperately, you try to sneak behind a pile of coins but the dragon spots you.

‘A sneaky little thief, eh! Can’t have that, oh no, not at all!’ hisses the dragon, and it breathes a cloud of billowing acidic gas all over you. You watch in horror as the coins in front of you begin to melt, and then the cloud engulfs you.
